raw_body: GOONESEKERE – NANDA (nee Nanayakkara). Beloved wife of the late Tissa Goonesekere (ex planter),​ beloved mother of Suramya,​ Bandula,​ Vishakha,​ Ashok,​ Prasanna,​ and Nilmini. Remains lie at Jayaratne VIP Restpect (Main Hall) Funeral Parlour on Wednesday 24th January from 8:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. Cremation at 5:30 p.m. General Cemetery (new) Borella.            005307
